body:
!include:miam-check!

## If you don’t have a valid reason

You’ll need to contact your mediator who carried out the MIAM and ask for a signed certificate confirming your attendance.

When you receive the certificate you can return to the application.

!include:miam-unsure!
!abbr:MIAM!
heading:
You need a signed MIAM certificate from your mediator
!abbr:MIAM!
lede: You need a certificate from your mediator to prove you have attended a MIAM, unless you have a valid reason.
